snippet.title: John's Tombstone Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
Drive inside a dream, explore one of Saturn's moons, and discover the afterlife. John's Tombstone is a walking simulator; a story split in three chapters, each chapter very different from the other. This game is a digital eulogy to my dad. 

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826820/Johns_Tombstone/?utm_source=youtube
